text: Hasilpur (Punjabi,), is a city in Hasilpur Tehsil of Bahawalpur District in southern Punjab, Pakistan.https://www.thepostalcodes.net/hasil-pur-mandi/ The city is located between the Satluj River and the Indian border and lies 96 km east of the district Bahawalpur.Hasilpur is as old as Bahawalpur. Hasil Khan Abbasi settled the city with his own name in 1752. Hasil Khan built a mosque in 1768. In 1900 there were about 347 houses. A special rest house (Dolat Khana) for Sadeq Mohammad Khan V was also Here.https://www.dawn.com/news/1068485 ==References== Category:Populated places in Bahawalpur District
title: Hasilpur
